info.title: Rust Full-Stack Starter API
info.description: A production-ready Rust web application starter with authentication, background tasks, and comprehensive API documentation.

post.description: Authenticate user with username/email and password
Logout current user and end all sessions
Logout current user from all devices and end all sessions
Refresh session token by extending its expiration time

get.description: Returns basic application health status with version and uptime
Returns comprehensive health status including database and dependencies
Kubernetes liveness probe endpoint. Returns 200 if application is running.
Kubernetes readiness probe endpoint. Returns 200 only if all dependencies are ready.
Kubernetes startup probe endpoint. Returns 200 when initialization is complete.

post.summary: Create a new alert (requires moderator or higher)

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description:
Tag filtering: supports key=value pairs separated by commas
Example: ?tags=user_id:123,environment:production

get.summary: Get a specific event by ID

put.summary: Update incident (requires moderator or higher, or be the creator)

403.description: Forbidden - requires moderator role or incident ownership

get.summary: Export metrics in Prometheus format (publicly accessible for scraping)

200.description: Prometheus metrics in text/plain format (version=0.0.4; charset=utf-8)

get.summary: Get monitoring system statistics (requires moderator or higher)

get.description: Get all failed tasks in the dead letter queue

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of tasks to return

get.description: Get statistics about tasks (total, pending, completed, failed, etc.)

post.description: Register a new task type that workers can handle

get.description: Get a task by its ID

delete.description: Permanently delete a completed, failed, or cancelled task

400.description: Task is not in a deletable status

post.description: Cancel a running or pending task
Retry a failed task by resetting it to pending status

400.description: Task is not in failed status

get.description: List all users in the system (Admin/Moderator only)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of users to return

post.description: Create a new user account (Admin only)

put.description: Change own password with current password verification

get.description: Get user information by user ID

400.description: Cannot delete own account via this endpoint

post.description: Force password reset for a user (Moderator/Admin)

put.description: Activate or deactivate a user account (Moderator/Admin)

CreateEventRequest.description:
API request structure for creating events

Validation limits:
- event_type: max [`MAX_EVENT_TYPE_LENGTH`] characters
- source: max [`MAX_SOURCE_LENGTH`] characters
- message: max [`MAX_MESSAGE_LENGTH`] characters
- level: max [`MAX_LEVEL_LENGTH`] characters
- tags: max [`MAX_TAGS_COUNT`] entries, max [`MAX_TAGS_JSON_SIZE`] bytes JSON
- payload: max [`MAX_PAYLOAD_FIELDS`] fields, max [`MAX_PAYLOAD_JSON_SIZE`] bytes JSON

CreateMetricRequest.description:
API request structure for submitting metrics

Validation limits:
- name: max [`MAX_METRIC_NAME_LENGTH`] characters
- value: must be finite number
- labels: max [`MAX_LABELS_COUNT`] entries, max [`MAX_TAGS_JSON_SIZE`] bytes JSON

oneOf.description: Fixed interval: delay = interval for each retry

fixed.description: Fixed interval: delay = interval for each retry

UserRole.description: User roles with hierarchy: User < Moderator < Admin
